mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_detail( mem_num, mem_name, mem_passwd, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_zipcode, mem_address1, mem_address2, mem_photo) VALUES( #{mem_num}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_passwd}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_zipcode}, #{mem_address1}, #{mem_address2}, #{mem_photo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_num, m.mem_id, m.mem_auth, d.au_id, d.mem_passwd, d.mem_email FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail d ON m.mem_num = d.mem_num WHERE m.mem_id = #{mem_id}
